data.title: Nights Are For Sleeping Lyrics
meta_keywords: Listen to Nights Are For Sleeping Song Online
Nights Are For Sleeping Song MP3 by Damn Seagulls
Download Nights Are For Sleeping Song from Let It Shine
data.meta_description: Nights Are For Sleeping Lyrics by Damn Seagulls. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
sometimes you came to me at night asking to turn off the light what, don′t you know the nights are for sleeping and days are for memories well i don't know... how yesterday went so fast i always thought it would last at least forever and a day from here to eternity but how could i′ve known 'couse life is a crssword and i don't know how to spell there′s too many options so how can you ever tell if nights are for sleeping then days are for something else i think we know it too well if there′s nothing on the horizon how do you get through your day i know i've said it before but if i want to go on i gotta get up, get up, get up or i fall down there′s only one way to go now and i ain't goin′ down there's always work to do as long as i have a plan when you feel that you can′t go on and all of your hope is gone you know like they sing in a motown song reach out no matter what you do how you pray the pain never goes away but don't carry it in your veins reach out Writer(s): Lauri Johannes Eloranta, Niko Yrjo Olavi Kangas, Jami Petteri Auvinen, Jani Johannes Liuhanen, Olli Ilari Noroviita, Matti Koivisto
Lyrics powered by www.musixmatch.com
